name: a day's work
description:
even ghosts have office jobs and must answer emails..
such is death ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Borksy by Ayolland 
Bitsy Hacks by Sean 
Image to Bitsy by Ruin

the SOUNDTRACK: basically any song on https://bc.s3m.us/album/minimap 
i drew the game while listening to it and its basically the mood :P

shout out to a hard day's night by the beatles for giving me some good vibes as i looped it while writing the text lol (also valiant vermin)

p.s. you wont get all the "chats" in the game unless u play it twice lol sorry not sorry
